attributes.action: NOT make contact details of sex offenders available to the public
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This will only lead to harrassment and attacks by vigilante groups, creating disorder. There have been cases where innocent people were attacked, due to mistaken identity. The law punishes offenders, it is not the right of individuals to take the law into their own hands. Offenders are not released if they pose a threat to the public. They can reform. Everyone deserves the chance to start again free from victimisation.
